course_title: Pre Application Clinical Knowledge and Skills
course_description: This 6-week course aims to bridge the gap between Foundations phase and Applications phase. Through a combination of didactics, small group sessions, hands on procedure training, and work with standardized patients students will strengthen their knowledge and skills to transition seamlessly into the clinical setting and direct patient care.
